posts.name: Harry Sanabria
posts.cooked:
Today, we’re releasing version 7.40 to beta. If you’re interested in participating, join the beta group .

Release notes:

  • Fans of big emotions (or emoji) will be happy to hear that a small space or line break between two emoji characters will no longer prevent those emoji from appearing in their jumbo form.
  • We also fixed a bug that sometimes caused the tab bar to cover the text input field, and another one that caused edited attachments to appear in the media gallery multiple times — so now you can change the past without feeling like you’re repeating it.

Let us know about any issues you experience! Thank you for being a beta tester!

link_counts.title: Beta feedback for the upcoming iOS 7.39 release

posts.cooked:
New Version: 7.40.0.482-beta

71 new commits since 7.39.0.473-beta (+ 1 commit omitted):

Show commits

  • Bump version to 7.40 [1]

  • Rebuild RequestMaker to support GSEs [2]

  • Don’t return TSGroupThreads when joining via link [3]

  • More consistently overwrite conflicting-version SS manifests from primaries [4]

  • Add a mode to rotateManifest to preserve records if possible [5]

  • Remove Promise that’s not needed [6]

  • Reformat group change parsing method [7]

  • Update copy for group links [8]

  • Show error when we can’t load the db on launch [9]

  • Broadcast the recordIkm-migration capability [10] (reverted by [14])

  • Rename methods to cancel join request [11]

  • Remove unused feature flag & its implementation [12]

  • Remove VoIP push handling [13]

  • Revert "Broadcast the recordIkm-migration capability" [14] (reverts [10])

  • Remove OWSUDSendingAccess [15]

  • Remove tail recursion from Sender Key retries [16]

  • Remove unused CDS proto file [17]

  • Force relays only if remote user is not a Signal Connection [18]

  • Dismiss sheet when linked device QR code in scanned [19]

  • Allow canceling past-due subscriptions [20]

  • Remove unused method [21]

  • Group too large to ring toast should not take full width on ipad [22]

  • Quote columns when building db restore query [23]

  • Consolidate some log formatters [24]

  • Add support for GSEs when updating groups [25]

  • Reorganize group change processing to reduce work [26]

  • Verify group IDs on peer-to-peer group changes [27]

  • Simplify code to join a group via invite link [28]

  • Remove no-longer-needed feature flags [29]

  • Update Join text color for call links [30]

  • Clean up PhoneNumber and PhoneNumberUtil [31]

  • Clean up app reset method [32]

  • Add linked devices education sheet [33]

  • Enable redesigned device linking with biometrics in prod [34]

  • Update backup integration tests [35]

  • Update to LibSignal v0.63.0 [36]

  • Initialize CLContainerView alongside other views [37]

  • Add a handler for the fallback iDEAL callback [38]

  • Make TSMessage TSAttachment migration blocking [39]

  • Add SubscriptionRedemptionNecessaryChecker [40]

  • Refactor BackupSubscriptionManager [41]

  • Hook up BackupSubscriptionManager to Storage Service [42]

  • Consolidate unrestricted UD handling [43]

  • Remove redundant Storage Service restore operation [44]

  • Use server change actions when removing members [45]

  • Update SMS provider error strings [46]

  • Show DonationSettings error state for canceled subs with charge failures [47]

  • Clean up stale viewState 'lastSelectedThreadId' [48]

  • Use sortId for ordering mutiple forwarded messages [49]

  • Allow whitespace in Jumbomoji [50]

  • Inherit navigation bar elevation when determining background color [51]

  • No longer need to manager tabbar during stories search [52]

  • Simplify showing Xcode previews for sheets [53]

  • Update link'n'sync picker style [54]

  • Update style of device linking sheets [55]

  • Add missing #if DEBUG checks [56]

  • Track IsPastEditRevision for media gallery filtering [57]

  • Revert "Avoid batch updates in updateLastViewedThread" [58]

  • Stop recording when max video size reached with in-app camera [59]

  • Remove MessageAttachmentMigrationTask id [60]

  • Optimize call label updates. [61]

  • Don’t auto refresh blocked groups [62]

  • Asyncify DeviceTransferOperation [63]

  • Improve URLSession error handling [64]

  • Remove versioned expire timer capability checking [65]

  • Clean up device linking UI [66]

  • Assume all clients are delete-sync-capable [67]

  • Remove unnecessary cleanup filtering [68]

  • Fix crash when opening call as admin which already has join requests [69]

  • Update release notes [70]

  • Update Translations [71]

Creating a message containing only emojis (allowed amount for jumbo emojis) and lots of space between makes the … for showing the whole message also „jumbo“

IMG_04891170×2532 158 KB

https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.40.0/ceca7674a18d736d9694aca264704ba6920122f90d5db0f88b5e4cb95298533d.zip

To be honest it’s a very niche bug, never mind ^^

Sounds like a big problem .

Edit: It was a pun if that wasn’t clear. I’m sorry if it came off as dismissive .

posts.name: Steven
posts.cooked:
I can’t figure out the rhyme or reason for this, it my Signal app icon is in “dark mode” a lot of the time even though my iOS is in light mode during the day.

This happened in 18.1.1 and now 18.2RC.

Actually, just figured out how to reproduce reliably. Reset the Signal icon within Signal itself to another icon style while the phone is in light mode. The icon will be light. Manually switch the phone into dark mode, observe the icon change to dark. Manually switch the phone to light mode and the Signal icon will not revert to the light mode.

Signal crashes repeatedly when trying to send a link from safari the moment the link preview gets generated
https://debuglogs.org/ios/7.40.0/a987cd8956ec974166872ac71cae57e82ca844255fef912efccd672c73e4910d.zip

posts.name: Elaine
posts.cooked: I’ve seen this happen on my device too, but I’ve also seen a similar thing with iOS system widgets, so I assume it’s a bug on Apple’s part.

posts.name: Harry Sanabria
posts.cooked:
Hi, would you be able to share the link that causes the crash (if it doesn’t reveal any personal info) or provide a crash report?

Did the crash happen when pasting the link into the Signal app text input, or when sharing to Signal via the system sharesheet?

posts.name: Steven
posts.cooked: You are likely right. The RC2 build of 18.2 seems to have fixed the issue for me.

posts.name: H
posts.cooked:
When using calls with proxy enabled, signal cannot establish the call when calling for the first time. Calling for the second time works as intended

(All of that happens when app is in background)

I‘m stuck in authenticating me: I wanted to share some photos from Signal with Signal and tapped share, but now, Signal wants my FaceID over and over again.

DebugLogs

Screen Recording

posts.name: Harry Sanabria
posts.cooked: Thanks for the report! While the symptom is quite confusing, the underlying issue is we’re unable to identify what is being shared via the system share sheet (and don’t have good error UI for when this happens, sorry about that!). Can you share any details about the file/object you’re trying to share? What kind of file it is, which app you’re sharing from, etc.

Greetings
Since the latest update on iOS to version 7.40 the app always crashes when it tries to open. iOS 17.x

Please assist as this is my only way of communicating with my relatives.

I tried to share a mix of photos and videos that have been sent to me in a single message via Signal via the share option because Signal didn’t show me the forward option at this time. I noticed Signal said the photos were „documents“.

posts.name: Harry Sanabria
posts.cooked: Hi, thanks so much for your report, and incredibly sorry about that breaking for you. If you try launching the app from the home screen again a few times, you should get a dialog that allows you to share some debug logs. Would you be able to share that debug log link here?

Hi harry

I sure can!
Does the debug log include any personal data? Or is it safe to share here instead of via private message?
